CustomField.description: This is a required field and automatically updated. Formula to calculate the total superior lien amount. The total amount of all liens with a higher position.
CustomField.formula: CASE(LLC_BI__Lien_Position__c, '1st', 0, '2nd', LLC_BI__Total_Prior_Lien_Amount__c - LLC_BI__Second_Lien_Position_Value__c - LLC_BI__Third_Lien_Position_Value__c - LLC_BI__Other_Lien_Position_Value__c,'3rd', LLC_BI__Total_Prior_Lien_Amount__c - LLC_BI__Third_Lien_Position_Value__c - LLC_BI__Other_Lien_Position_Value__c,'Other', LLC_BI__Total_Prior_Lien_Amount__c - LLC_BI__Other_Lien_Position_Value__c,0)
CustomField.label: Total Superior Lien Amount
